title: League of Legends has become quite the mobile game
body:
https://pre00.deviantart.net/8c00/th/pre/i/2014/352/7/9/fiddlesticks__riot_art_contest_by_aem_88-d8aa7ol.jpg
Talking about the mobility of some champions
Lots of mobility has been added to the game 
I myself find that {{champion:9}} Drain (W)
Is kinda UP in this regard
{{champion:9}} is a old chap
made in a time when mobility was almost nonexistent 
And with the changes made to his Q 
(they changed fiddlesticks fear from a running around slowly)
(to running away from fiddlesticks...)
This destroyed all the synergy Fiddlesticks abilities had...

He can still played off course cause silences and fears are pretty powerful in this game
full of dashes/cc and other kind of mobility and disables 
But it still bugs me to see fiddlesticks this way...

Hoping for a quick fiddlesticks rework 
Or a change to his W

https://img00.deviantart.net/1c57/i/2010/230/e/6/league_of_legends_fiddlesticks_by_anarki3000.jpg

I myself have also been playing a 2 vs 2 mobo
where the fear was being implanted to increase the Movement speed of the enemies running away
making fear a true fear 

Why not change Fiddlesticks W ability into a skill shot?
Where he throws his Scythe 
If it hits, he drains his enemies with his scythe 
What also can be done 
Is make his W like a {{champion:57}} kind of ability
Where his W gets stronger when hiding inside a bush
Empowering the fear factor fiddlesticks should have!

Well that was my brainstorm for now
Got everything off my chest
May you enjoy it or destroy it
Or maybe use it
We shall see
/Praise The Darkness!

https://orig00.deviantart.net/8686/f/2012/094/7/4/fiddle_sticks_by_rayzerno-d4uz82j.png
